title: Missing keys
body: I've been waiting till the skt skins to come out to use my keys. I'm fairly certain I had 3 keys sitting in my loot to open boxes once it came out. I went on yesterday to find my keys missing!

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, but I wasn't able to find anything weird or out of the ordinary.  I do see you had 3 fragments yesterday that was fused into a key.  It was used to open a mastery chest for a Candy King Ivern shard.  Let me know if that helps.
